name: Abstract Garden
description:
This game was made for Tig's Jam #2, however I wasn't able to submit on time due to problems with the build process. I finally figured it out and so here it is. 

Gameplay:

The game is a fast paced FPS based around preventing the large yellow Lanterns from being lit, as they summon dangerous swarms of yellow cubes. The towers are lit by Caretakers, which are invisible except in the darkness created by your laser, at which point they appear as large red cubes.

Controls:

'WASD' - Move

'Shift' - Sprint

'Space' - Jump/Double Jump

'Right Mouse-Button' - Aim

'Left Mouse-Button' - Fire

Note: the game needs sounds, tutorials, pause menu's and a bit of tweaking. I intend to update it soon, but will also leave the original version for posterity.
